content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Journey into the heart of insanity. Far off the charts lies an island unlike any other. A place where heavily armed warlords traffic in slaves. Where outsiders are hunted for ransom. As you embark on a desperate quest to rescue your friends, you realize that the only way to escape this darkness… is to embrace it. This Ultimate Edition also includes all bonus DLC content: Monkey Business Pack, Lost Expeditions, Warrior Pack, and Predator Pack.

- The Monkey Business Pack: Meet Hurk and his explosive bomb-carrying monkey in four heart-pounding missions
- The Lost Expeditions: Discover the secrets of the island’s lost World War II ruins in two suspenseful action missions
- The Warrior Pack: Strike fear in your enemies with an exclusive dagger
- The Predator Pack: Hunt four ferocious animals with the M-700 Predator Rifle

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-14

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
